summary: Add support for the new Worker Versioning API in PHP SDK through annotations. This involves implementing workflow annotations similar to Python and .NET SDKs to enable the versioning features.
userImpact: Users will be able to manage workflow versioning and compatibility in PHP applications using standardized annotations.
proposedFix: Implement annotations following the design patterns specified in the cross-language design document, using examples from Python and .NET SDKs as reference.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented with annotations support for the new Worker Versioning API in PHP SDK.
keyQuote: There are some designs for our other languages here... In PHP, I fully expect that we should use annotations like in the Python and .NET examples
